name: Rector Drath
aura: Increase Ally  in Doom Tower battles by 55

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 35% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Scepter of Authority
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%

skills.desc: Heals all allies by 20% of this Champion's MAX HP. After healing, places a [Perfect Veil] buff for 2 turns on all allies with full HP. Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff for 1 turn instead on all allies with less than 100% HP.
skills.name: Necro Mutation
skills.books:
Lvl. 2  Heal +5%
Lvl. 3  Heal +5%
Lvl. 4  Heal +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Revives a single ally with 60% HP and fills their Turn Meter by 60%. Places a [Perfect Veil] buff on them for 3 turns.
skills.name: Spirit Form

skills.desc:
Whenever an ally under a [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buff gets a turn, heals them by 10% of their MAX HP. Also increases the RES of allies under [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buffs by 50.

[Will only increase RES once per ally if there are multiple Rectors on the team.]
skills.name: Master of Ghosts [P]
